instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initialize a singleton instance of the [Config] account.

instructions.name: initializeTipDistributionAccount
docs: Initialize a new [TipDistributionAccount] associated with the given validator vote key
and current epoch.

accounts.name: validatorVoteAccount
docs: The validator's vote account is used to check this transaction's signer is also the authorized withdrawer.

accounts.name: signer
docs: Must be equal to the supplied validator vote account's authorized withdrawer.

instructions.name: updateConfig
docs: Update config fields. Only the [Config] authority can invoke this.

instructions.name: uploadMerkleRoot
docs: Uploads a merkle root to the provided [TipDistributionAccount]. This instruction may be
invoked many times as long as the account is at least one epoch old and not expired; and
no funds have already been claimed. Only the `merkle_root_upload_authority` has the
authority to invoke.

instructions.name: closeClaimStatus
docs: Anyone can invoke this only after the [TipDistributionAccount] has expired.
This instruction will return any rent back to `claimant` and close the account

accounts.name: claimStatusPayer
docs: Receiver of the funds.

instructions.name: closeTipDistributionAccount
docs: Anyone can invoke this only after the [TipDistributionAccount] has expired.
This instruction will send any unclaimed funds to the designated `expired_funds_account`
before closing and returning the rent exempt funds to the validator.

accounts.name: signer
docs: Anyone can crank this instruction.

instructions.name: claim
docs: Claims tokens from the [TipDistributionAccount].

accounts.name: claimStatus
docs: Status of the claim. Used to prevent the same party from claiming multiple times.

accounts.name: claimant
docs: Receiver of the funds.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Who is paying for the claim.

fields.name: authority
docs: Account with authority over this PDA.

fields.name: expiredFundsAccount
docs: We want to expire funds after some time so that validators can be refunded the rent.
Expired funds will get transferred to this account.

fields.name: numEpochsValid
docs: Specifies the number of epochs a merkle root is valid for before expiring.

fields.name: maxValidatorCommissionBps
docs: The maximum commission a validator can set on their distribution account.

fields.name: bump
docs: The bump used to generate this account

accounts.name: TipDistributionAccount
docs: The account that validators register as **tip_receiver** with the tip-payment program.

fields.name: validatorVoteAccount
docs: The validator's vote account, also the recipient of remaining lamports after
upon closing this account.

fields.name: merkleRootUploadAuthority
docs: The only account authorized to upload a merkle-root for this account.

fields.name: merkleRoot
docs: The merkle root used to verify user claims from this account.

fields.name: epochCreatedAt
docs: Epoch for which this account was created.

fields.name: validatorCommissionBps
docs: The commission basis points this validator charges.

fields.name: expiresAt
docs: The epoch (upto and including) that tip funds can be claimed.

fields.name: bump
docs: The bump used to generate this account

accounts.name: ClaimStatus
docs: Gives us an audit trail of who and what was claimed; also enforces and only-once claim by any party.

fields.name: isClaimed
docs: If true, the tokens have been claimed.

fields.name: claimant
docs: Authority that claimed the tokens. Allows for delegated rewards claiming.

fields.name: claimStatusPayer
docs: The payer who created the claim.

fields.name: slotClaimedAt
docs: When the funds were claimed.

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount of funds claimed.

fields.name: expiresAt
docs: The epoch (upto and including) that tip funds can be claimed.
Copied since TDA can be closed, need to track to avoid making multiple claims

fields.name: bump
docs: The bump used to generate this account

fields.name: root
docs: The 256-bit merkle root.

fields.name: maxTotalClaim
docs: Maximum number of funds that can ever be claimed from this [MerkleRoot].

fields.name: maxNumNodes
docs: Maximum number of nodes that can ever be claimed from this [MerkleRoot].

fields.name: totalFundsClaimed
docs: Total funds that have been claimed.

fields.name: numNodesClaimed
docs: Number of nodes that have been claimed.

errors.name: ExceedsMaxClaim
errors.msg: The maximum number of funds to be claimed has been exceeded.

errors.name: ExceedsMaxNumNodes
errors.msg: The maximum number of claims has been exceeded.

errors.name: FundsAlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: The funds for the given index and TipDistributionAccount have already been claimed.

errors.name: InvalidVoteAccountData
errors.msg: Failed to deserialize the supplied vote account data.

errors.name: MaxValidatorCommissionFeeBpsExceeded
errors.msg: Validator's commission basis points must be less than or equal to the Config account's max_validator_commission_bps.

errors.name: PrematureCloseTipDistributionAccount
errors.msg: The given TipDistributionAccount is not ready to be closed.

errors.name: PrematureCloseClaimStatus
errors.msg: The given ClaimStatus account is not ready to be closed.

errors.name: PrematureMerkleRootUpload
errors.msg: Must wait till at least one epoch after the tip distribution account was created to upload the merkle root.

errors.name: RootNotUploaded
errors.msg: No merkle root has been uploaded to the given TipDistributionAccount.
